Fix regression from using `saved_changes` instead of `changes`

Rails 5.1.0 saved_changes behaves differently to changes: it returns
the previous non existent change for the images column as nil instead
of an empty array.

commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library

commit_list.message:
Add tab and tablist ARIA roles to Tabs component

A list of tab elements, which are references to tabpanel elements

https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria/roles#tablist
https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria/roles#tab

Ideally we would automatically handle the aria-labelledby for the
tabpanel and the corresponding tab. However, as these are cloned we
don’t have control over the props that will be applied to the child
nodes.
commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library

commit_list.message:
Remove onMouseOver and onMouseOut from validation message

The validation message itself does not need the mouse triggers to show
call the functions that show the message.

This would also raise a a11y linting error as the onBlur and onFocus
callbacks should be assigned if onMouseOver and onMouseOut are used
commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library

commit_list.message:
CSS updates to the Date component after QA feedback

- Ensure today's date is no longer white text on white (when outside
current month but still visibile)
- Ensure style of selected date is correct (when outside current month
but still visible)
- Fixed hover color for outside days (was the wrong blue)
- Changed outside days text color from blue to grey (slightly darker
grey than disabled days)
- Fixed focus outline so it is not cropped by the rounded border
- Removed fixed width so that the picker is the correct width if
smaller abbreviations are used as headings
commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library

commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library

commit_list.message:
Update the library used by Date component

Switched from react-date-picker to react-day-picker as the old library
is no longer being maintained.

https://github.com/gpbl/react-day-picker

Note that moment js has been specifically not included in Date and is
isolated to within DateHelper. This is to abstract it incase it is ever
changed.

To test the locale switching on the Carbon demo site you can visit:
http://localhost:8095/components/date-input?locale=fr
(only French is currently supported)
commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library

Prevent Safari from changing the mouse cursor on drag

dragging a dom node or is already dragging.
commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library
Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library
Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library

commit_list.message:
Add the Portal component and apply to the Tooltip decorator

The Portal component pulls a component out into the top level of the
DOM. The benefit of this is so that it is not effected by it’s position
in the markup and cascading styles.

The underlying functionality is provided by the library:
https://github.com/tajo/react-portal
commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library

commit_list.message:
Add Portal to the Date component

Note that in order to write the specs I needed to add a ref to the Portal
component itself. This is so that the content inside the Portal can be
found using Enzyme as the content has been pulled out of the dom tree of
the parent component.
commit_list.repo_description: Carbon by Sage | ReactJS UI Component Library
